name: Solitude (NicMagnier)
description:
You are a lonely dot that decides one day to explore the vast world around you.

You can climb anything by simply using the arrow keys but keep holding them if you don't want to fall.

(Pssst ... there is 3 secrets to discover in the wilderness, mail me if you find them all nmagnier@gmail.com)

The game was done during the Slow Game Jam. The game is literally slow but this is to encourage contemplation and the enjoyment of the small things.

https://itch.io/jam/slow-game-jam

Art, code, coffee, sound: @nicmagnier

Update 17/04/2017

- Correct physics bug
